AUTH_FAILED_TRY_AGAIN_1_MINUTE: Authentication failed.  Please try again in one minute ...
CONFIRM_JOIN_GROUP: You are now a member of the group : _ARG1
CONSENT_TEXT: By registering to this application you consent to share your email address and your current location.
Check to show map: Check to display map when recording
Check to show slider to stop recording: Check to show slider to stop recording
Check to use cellular network: Check to use cellular network if available
Check to use wifi network: Check to use wifi network if available
Create your Gravatar: Create your Gravatar (open in new window)
Delete.Account.Warning: If you delete your account all data collected will be permanently deleted. You will not be able to login to the application and you will need to register again.
GPS_FIX_ERROR_MSG_1: The acquisition of the geolocation information failed because the page didn't have the necessary permissions.
GPS_FIX_ERROR_MSG_2: The acquisition of the geolocation failed because at least one internal source of position returned an internal error.
GPS_FIX_ERROR_MSG_3: The time allowed to acquire the geolocation was reached before the information was obtained.
Heading: Heading
Init.Confirm: Are you sure you want to initialize your device ?
Init.Warning: If you initialize your device all parameters and recorded data on your device will be erased. Data stored on the cloud will not be erased. You need to close your account to erase data on the cloud.
PIN.warning: Your PIN is required to open motoRR
Private.Key.Warning: Do not share your private key.
Profile.DisplayName.Warning: This display name is already taken
SHARE_APP: You can share this app with a friend. Ask your friends to scan the QR code or share the link below.
Send.Email.Warning: For any suggestions or to register to the application during the ALPHA phase please send me an email. Do not change the subject since it is use to automate the registration process.
Share.Public.Key: Ask a trusted party to scan your public key's QR code to be added to his contact list. Once the other party has your public key all communication is encrypted from his device to yours as long as your private key has not been compromised. If you believe your keys has been compromised simply re-configure E2EE. You will need to share again your public key with all party involve.
Slide to the right to stop recording: Slide to the right to stop recording
To join this group: To create or join this group you must provide a secret code
clipboard-copy-not-ok: Unable to copy the URL to the clipboard
clipboard-copy-ok: The URL has been copied to the clipboard
gravatar-network-disabled-warning: Make sure network has been enabled in settings.
gravatar-warning: Gravatar powers your public profile, visible wherever you post, comment, and interact online.
network-warning: You must be a registered user to use the cloud feature.
screen-saver-warning: Screen will turn black for 2 seconds.
